text: Guillermo Stábile (17 January 1905 – 27 December 1966) is a former Argentine football player. He has played for Argentina national team. ==International career statistics== |- |1930||4||8 |- !Total||4||8 ==Honours== ===Player=== Huracán * Primera División: 1925, 1928 * Copa Ibarguren: 1925 Argentina * FIFA World Cup Runner-up: 1930 Individual * FIFA World Cup Golden Boot: 1930 * FIFA World Cup All-Star Team: 1930 ===Manager=== Racing Club * Primera División: 1949, 1950, 1951 Argentina * South American Championship (6): 1941, 1945, 1946, 1947, 1955, 1957 * Pan American Games: 1951, 1955 * Panamerican Championship: 1960 ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine football managers Category:Club Atlético Huracán managers Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Guillermo Stábile
